0111101011100011 1011101101011000 1 -> sum: 0011011000111100, cout: 1

1100111000011101 1100011111100111 1 -> sum: 1001011000000101, cout: 1
1010010101001001 0000101001100010 0 -> sum: 1010111110101011, cout: 0
1101100010001010 1001101111001101 1 -> sum: 0111010001011000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
